en-US: After being approved, please gently ask the community admin (usually the owner) for the early access link, and provide the reason why you need early access at the same time. The admin will provide you with the link to the early access resources if you are eligible. If you didn't get a response within a reasonable time, please send messages to other admins or moderators.
zh-CN: 获得批准后，请礼貌地向社区管理员 (通常是所有者) 申请加入内测，并同时提供您需要提前访问的原因。如果您符合条件，管理员将向您提供早期访问资源的链接。如果您在合理的时间内没有得到回应，请向其他管理员或版主发送消息。
